titleInfo.title: Letter from Richard Thomas Goodwin, Secretary and Translator in the Office of Country Correspondence to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing two letters from Sir Evan Nepean, Governor of Bombay to Futteh Ali Shah [Fath Ali Shah] and Mohomed bin Naser [Muhammad bin Nasir al-Jabri] respectively, both dated 12 April 1816 and requesting that Bruce forward them. Translations of the letters are included.The letter to Futek Allie Khan is in response to his recommendation of Assistant Surgeon Richard Sharp for preferential treatment. The letter to Mohomed bin Nasser thanks him for his submission to the British.
